cast.name: 詹姆斯·内斯比特 James Nesbitt
拉塞尔·T·戴维斯 Russell T. Davies
马丁·克鲁勒斯 Martin Clunes
柯林·德克斯特 Colin Dexter
劳伦斯·福克斯 Laurence Fox
安东尼·安德鲁斯 Anthony Andrews
奈杰尔·哈弗斯 Nigel Havers
杰拉丁妮·詹姆斯 Geraldine James
伯纳德·康威尔 Bernard Cornwell

introduction: A look at the stories behind classic British TV dramas and the connections between them.S1, Ep1'Coronation Street' to 'Kingdom'A look at Coronation Street (1960), Wire in the Blood (2002), Fat Friends (2000), At Home with the Braithwaites (2000), Mobile (2007) and Kingdom (2007).S1,Ep2'Jewel in the Crown' to 'Band of Gold'A look at The Jewel in the Crown (1984), Wild at Heart (2006), Jeeves and Wooster (1990), Inspector Morse (1987), Vincent (2005) and Band of Gold (1995).S1, Ep3'Doc Martin' to 'Foyle's War'A look at Doc Martin (2004), Heartbeat (1992), Lewis (2007), Mansfield Park (2007), Chancer (1990) and Foyle's War (2002).S1, Ep4'Bad Girls' to 'Cold Blood'A look at Bad Girls (1999), Emmerdale Farm (1972), Rosemary & Thyme (2003), Emma (1996), The Royal (2003) and Cold Blood (2005).S1, Ep5'Cold Feet' to 'A Touch of Frost'A look at Cold Feet (1997), Bob & Rose (2001), The Prisoner (1967), Bouquet of Barbed Wire (1976), Wish Me Luck (1987) and A Touch of Frost (1992).S1, Ep6'Secret Diary of a Call Girl' to 'London's Burning'A look at Secret Diary of a Call Girl (2007), Jane Hall (2005), Cadfael (1994), Wycliffe (1994), The Darling Buds of May (1991) and London's Burning (1988).S1, Ep7'The Vice' to 'Prime Suspect'A look at The Vice (1999), William and Mary (2003), Tales of the Unexpected (1979), Robin of Sherwood (1984), The Grimleys (1999) and Prime Suspect (1991).S1, Ep8'The Second Coming' to 'Afterlife'A look at The Second Coming (2003), Auf Wiedersehen, Pet (1983), Where the Heart Is (1997), The Charmer (1987), Dempsey and Makepeace (1985) and Afterlife (2005).S1, Ep9'Footballer's Wives' to 'Brideshead Revisited'A look at Footballers' Wives (2002), Upstairs, Downstairs (1971), Sharpe, The Last Detective (2003), The Avengers (1961) and Brideshead Revisited (1981).S1, Ep10'The Fixer' to 'Trial and Retribution'A look at The Fixer (2008), Shine on Harvey Moon (1982), Crossroads (1964), Stay Lucky (1989), Ruth Rendell Mysteries (1987) and Trial & Retribution (1997).
